price: 115. Nabiyow ama salaatal isbiraay, tama koros kot abta adál isbir, diggah Yalli taamá yessemeqqee marih galtó mabaysak.
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'bir fa-inna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-muḥ'sinīna
